pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-rev===========This is a python wrapper around the REV Robotics REVLib. The RobotPy projectis not associated with or endorsed by REV Robotics.Documentation=============* `Installation <http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install/rev.html>`_* `Python API Documentation <http://robotpy.readthedocs.io/projects/rev/en/stable/api.html>`_* `REVLib documentation <https://docs.revrobotics.com/docs/first-robotics-competition>`_License=======RobotPy specific bits are available under a BSD-3-Clause license. The REVspecific pieces are available under a BSD license.Author======Dustin Spicuzza (dustin@virtualroadside.com)
